i'm not entirely sure if this is where we put the games we've made we want others to play or if we're supposed to just put them in the general discussion chat but i've revamped my old game from a year or two ago and was hoping you all would enjoy the new story
also if you would i'd love to hear how to make the text appear as if it's being typed out(i was the browser version so don't think i have the majority of access to content?? i'm still trying to figure out how this works) and other appearance based improvements that would improve the overall experience
